entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers changing to 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers near midnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 3:58 PM EDT Sunday 23 April 2023
